subject: Hi Friend from Earth's outst
body:
Hi Friend from Earth's outstanding boarders  ,‚Äè
Wow i know you are surprised how i found your email address this is a surprise response from me to your profile i found after using a sophisticated american technological software robot to search for profiles of special people online so i can be life time friends with them on the google social network....I could not believe my spirit felt a strong sensation about your profile when i stumbled on your profile information over the internet . A strong current of sensation flowed through my blood stream and i just could not resist it , i couldn't let your profile pass me by then i decided to listen to my inner voice of my spirit telling me to send  you this friend request .
  Anyways thanks to God i followed and obeyed the inner voice of the spirit to write you .Sorry for contacting you without your prior permission but I hope we can establish a good relationship since we are meeting for the first time.
I want to use this opportunity to tell you about me, My name is Captain Amy Bauernschmidt an american Citizen from Milwaukee, Wisconsin, in the United States of America.
About me, I have a good heart, I am very sincere and down to earth. I have a loving heart , generous and am very respectful and kind Woman, I have a lot of love to give, my own Religious is Catholic christian with a Jewish heritage from my mother who is jew now living in her country Israel but I also welcome friends into my life from other religions, I never judge others and am very compassionate, i love to appreciate the little things in life and am very respectful.
Dear, i have my reasons to contact you as i have something very important to share with you this new year 2024 in my next mail. I wish to start a very strong relationship with you this year and my relationship with you will bring  a lot of great changes in your life and my life also.  I want you to understand that a good relationship does not count the distance and age difference,  maybe we can start as friend or go into partnership !!!
Dear, What do you do for a living to overcome economical hardships , expenses and to sustain your life and family during hardtimes ?  i know we are just knowing each other but we can share ideas and discuss about important things and more issues as we talk about ourselves, I like to think positively and I care about other people's feelings too !
I will be very happy to know more about you, like your hobbies, Interest, Life style, Religious believe, i will also love to see more of your pictures, like i always say  i have very very important issue to share and discuss with you privately in my next mail based on confidentiality so that you will give  me an advice and solution about it, Let me stop here for now,i expect an urgent response from you soon.
Yours Faithfully
Captain Amy Bauernschmidt
From Milwaukee Wisconsin, USA

subject: Re:   Hi Friend from Earth's outst
body:
Hello Captain from Milwaukee, Wisconsin, USA,

Wow! Your message really took me by surprise. I'm not used to receiving such interesting emails. It's nice to meet you, even if it is just over the internet.

I'm intrigued by your mention of a strong sensation and inner voice. That sounds quite mystical and fascinating. I've always been interested in spiritual matters, so it's great to hear from someone who seems to have a deep connection with their own spirit.

It's also wonderful to hear that you're a kind and respectful person. The world could certainly use more people like that!

As for your question about what I do for a living, well, let's just say I keep myself busy with various activities. I prefer not to go into too much detail about my personal life online though.

You mentioned having something important to share in your next email? That sounds intriguing! Can you give me a hint about what it might be?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
John
